oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dry matter production of annually cultivated forage legumes in organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nyk채nen-Kurki, P.
Leinonen, P.
Nyk채nen, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Pasture and forage crops
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In 1998-2001 nineteen forage legume species were evaluated at two sites of Eastern Finland. Species were studied for their annual productivity in pure stands and in mixtures with cereals (barley and oats) and Italian ryegrass. Swards were cut either twice or once per year.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Nyk채nen-Kurki, P.; Leinonen, P. and Nyk채nen, A. (2004) Dry matter production of annually cultivated forage legumes in organic farming. In: The International school-conference plant cultivation in the European North: the present situation and the prospects dedicated to the 50th anneversary of the Department of Agriculture and Soil Science, the Pedrozavodsk State University, pp. 189-191.
